meanings.definition: The emission of light not caused by incandescence
meanings.sent1: The luminescences from the fireflies lit up the night sky.
meanings.sent2: The luminescences of the glow-in-the-dark stars made the room magical.
meanings.sent3: The luminescences of the jellyfish made them look like underwater lanterns.
meanings.sent4: The luminescences of the city at night resembled a galaxy of stars.
meanings.sent5: The luminescences of the lightning bugs created a mesmerizing display.

meanings.sent1: The luminescences of the moon illuminated the dark forest.
meanings.sent2: The luminescences of the fireflies added a magical touch to the garden.
meanings.sent3: The luminescences of the glow sticks made the party more fun.
meanings.sent4: The luminescences of the stars in the sky were breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The luminescences of the nightlight comforted the child in the dark.

meanings.sent1: The luminescences of the light bulb brightened the room.
meanings.sent2: The luminescences of the sun warmed the earth.
meanings.sent3: The luminescences of the fireworks lit up the sky in celebration.
meanings.sent4: The luminescences of the campfire flickered in the darkness.
meanings.sent5: The luminescences of the candle created a cozy atmosphere.
